Classes
Class
Description
Connect4Controller
Controls the logic and interaction of the Connect Four game.

The main class for the Connect Four game application.

Controls the menu actions of the Connect Four game.
PlayerName
Panel for entering player names.
TimerActionListener

Class responsible for handling translations in the application.
